name: Living Dolls Rebirth Alpha
description:
Welcome to the Fantasy Adult World!

Immerse yourself in an open world for PC that promises to captivate your imagination.

Living Doll

In "Living Dolls", step into the shoes of a magical artificial being. Bond with the inhabitants, build your strength, and create fully customizable dolls to aid you in battles!

Principal Features

  • Open World Exploration
  • Engaging Adult Scenes
  • Fully Customizable Characters
  • Unique Futanari Feature
  • Kinky NPCs
  • Stunning World Aesthetics
  • AAA-Game Class Visuals
  • Intense Sword Fights
  • Crafting & Experience System

Planned Features

  • Introduction of New Species & Furry Characters
  • Engrossing Story Mode
  • Party System with Other Dolls
  • Mysterious Dungeons
  • Engaging Quest System
  • Buyable & Upgradable Houses
  • Full Voice Dubbing
  • Expansion to New Lands and Locations
